name: Cat Going Up
description:
Play as a purple color cat who wants to build and climb the tower to the heaven above. A thrilling score attack action platformer is here. Meow your way up there!

Controls:

- A : move the cat to the left

- D : move the cat to the right

- Spacebar : jump

- Click and drag the objects to relocate them

Credits:

- Artist: AquaNoixl, Moddeang

- Programmer: Khami, Indy
